scripts.build:sqlite-otel: rm -rf dist/sqlite-otel && mkdir -p dist/sqlite-otel/{docs,assets,css,js} && git -C sqlite-otel show main:site/index.html > dist/sqlite-otel/index.html && git -C sqlite-otel show main:site/css/style.css > dist/sqlite-otel/css/style.css && git -C sqlite-otel show main:site/js/main.js > dist/sqlite-otel/js/main.js && git -C sqlite-otel show main:site/assets/favicon.svg > dist/sqlite-otel/assets/favicon.svg && git -C sqlite-otel show main:site/assets/logo.svg > dist/sqlite-otel/assets/logo.svg && cp -r sqlite-otel/site/* dist/sqlite-otel/docs/ && echo 'Build complete - original static site at root, MkDocs docs at /docs/'
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx serve dist
